common.something_went_wrong: Wani Abu Ya Faru. Domin Ka Saba Yadda.

home.title: Cibiyar Jita-jita Ta Kasuwar Ciki
home.subtitle: Karewa Masu Wasan Azarta A Cikin Afrika
home.description: NSER wata cibiya ta cikakke ce da aka gida don ba da damar mutane su cire kansu daga abubuwan wasan azarta.

about.title: Maganin NSER
about.description: Cibiyar Jita-jita Ta Kasuwar Ciki (NSER) wata jẹ-kere ce da aka ƙira don taimaki mutane su can ka abubuwan jita.
about.mission_text: Samar da dandali mai tsarki, gaskiya, da sauƙi don mutane su cire kansu daga abubuwan wasan azarta.
about.vision_text: Aiki inda a iya rigakafin jita-jitaf wasan azarta ta hanyar ƙarawa matakin asiri da abubuwan jita na hanna.
about.how_it_works_text: Yi rajista na jita-jitaka tare da NSER, kuma za mu sanar da dukan ɓoye. Jita-jitaka tana da ƙarewa na shari'a.

self_exclude.title: Yi Rajista Don Jita-jita
self_exclude.subtitle: Mamaye wasan azarta na kai
self_exclude.description: Jita-jita wata kyan ne de taimaki ka kai tun wasan azarta. Idan ka yi rajista tare da NSER, dukan masu samun rikodi dole ne su gaje ka.
self_exclude.privacy_agree: Na fahimta cewa bayanan na za su tuba wajen yakamaf jita-jita
self_exclude.error_message: An saba wajen saka. Domin ka saba yadda.
self_exclude.confirmation_text: Kana shirin saka don jita-jita. Aiki nan yana da ƙarewa na shari'a.

faq.title: Tambaye da ake Bugi
faq.no_results: Babu tambayi da ya dace da bugi na kai

questions.question: Me ne Cibiyar Jita-jita Ta Kasuwar Ciki?
questions.answer: NSER wata cibiya ta cikakke ce de ba da damar mutane su cire kansu daga abubuwan wasan azarta.

questions.question: Yadda Jita-jita Take Aiki?
questions.answer: Idan ka yi rajista tare da NSER, za mu sanar da dukan ɓoye wanda dole ne su gaje ka.

questions.question: Jita-jita Tana Da Ƙarewa Na Shari'a?
questions.answer: Eh, jita-jita da aka saka tare da NSER tana da ƙarewa na shari'a. Dukan ɓoye dole ne su yi.

questions.question: Zai Iya Ɗaukar Jita-jita Ta Kai Kafin Lokaci?
questions.answer: Ɗaukar jita-jita kafin lokaci ya dogara ga sharuɗɗan da ka yarda. Tuntubayi wa duk NSER.

questions.question: Bayanan Ni Naka A Asiri?
questions.answer: Eh, bayanan kai ana kare shi kuma ana raba shi ga ɓoye kawai wanda suke buƙata wajen yakamaf jita-jita.

questions.question: NSER Na Watse?
questions.answer: NSER na duk wanda ya ji yana buƙatar karewa wasan azarta da kuma yana so ya cire kai.

questions.question: Wane Ɓoye Ke Samu A NSER?
questions.answer: Yawancin ɓoye masu girma a Afrika suna samu a NSER. Duba jerin ɓoye namu.

questions.question: Jita-jita Tana Zama Nawa Lokaci?
questions.answer: Zaka iya zaɓi namanyan jita daga watanni shida har zaman jiya.

contact.title: Tuntubayi Mu
contact.subtitle: Muna Nan Gami Ka
contact.description: Kana da tambaye kan NSER? Tuntubayi da gidan duk mu.
contact.name: Cikakken Suna
contact.subject: Batun
contact.success: Na gode mun tuntubayi. Za mu amsa zao.
contact.error: An saba wajen aika saƙo. Domin ka saba yadda.
contact.office_hours: Litini - Juma, 9 AM - 5 PM (Lokacin Gabashin Afrika)
